Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are staring in awe at the powerful monument to Corellon Larethian.
Room.LongDescription: Amberton Lane continues to the north and south, passing by the Holy Order of Corellon Larethian on the east and the Bushman Farms and Estate on the west. The magnificent shrine, dedicated to the elven god of everything that is, rises high into the sky, as a monument to all elves of good faith.
